techmeme.title: Nexthop AI launches with $110M in seed and Series A funding led by Lightspeed Ventures, offering hardware and software for cloud AI infrastructure (Kyt Dotson/SiliconANGLE)
OpenAI starts rolling out GPT-4o-powered "Images in ChatGPT" to all tiers including free; OpenAI says it's a step change above previous image-generating models (Kylie Robison/The Verge)
The Arc Prize Foundation says its new ARC-AGI-2 test stumps most AI models; humans get 60% of the questions right but GPT-4.5 and Claude 3.7 Sonnet score ~1% (Maxwell Zeff/TechCrunch)
Meta rolls out a pilot program on Instagram designed to let US schools flag any potentially rule-violating post or account for prioritized review (Emma Roth/The Verge)
Apple announces WWDC 2025 for June 9-13, which will be an "entirely online" event free for developers, with an in-person special event at Apple Park on June 9 (Chance Miller/9to5Mac)
